oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Beale Street Shimmie
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beale Street; music; sheet music; jazz;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover of the sheet music to Samuel B. Simms' "Beale Street Shimmie" or "Metropolitan Blues" as played by Johnson's Jazz Band of Memphis, Tenn. Together Johnson and Simms published this sheet music. Their publishing office was located at 321 Beale Ave.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Simms, Samuel B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: W. C. Handy Beale Street Collection
